author: Bellular News
description:
Start speaking a new language in 3 weeks with Babbel 🎉 Get up to 55% OFF your subscription here: http://Babbel.com/bellular Sponsored by Babbel!

Bloomberg reveals Microsoft demands Xbox maintain a 30% profit margin—a target even Nintendo can't consistently hit—explaining the mass layoffs, studio closures, and multiplatform strategy destroying the brand.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

02:22 Xbox's Messy Half Decade

13:21 The Internal Threat
